title: Bone Key
summaries: The Bone Key is a pet-summoning item that spawns a Baby Skeletron Head to follow the player around. The Baby Skeletron Head floats around the player and sometimes spins its head, similarly to Skeletron's spinning head attack or the Dungeon Guardians in general. This action may also occur if the player is a bit further away from the Skeletron Head. The Bone Key is always dropped from the Dungeon Guardian. Because Dungeon Guardians have extremely high stats intended to instantly kill all players, this can be a difficult item to acquire.

statistics.Sell: 5 GC
